Hi Katie,

We have cleared the site cache. Can you try now?

https://acoufelt.co.uk/acoustic-products/wall/

Hey Joel, It still doesn't seem to be pulling through on
  • https://acoufelt.co.uk/acoustic-products/wall/
  • https://acoufelt.co.uk/acoustic-products/
Anything I need to be doing on my end? Warm regards, Katie Kenna Marketing Coordinator - EMEA T: +44 (0) 203 488 6322 Level 1, 1 Old Street, London, EC1V 9HL, UK acoufelt.com

Hi Katie,

Sure, confirming we have updated the page and the menu.
https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/quietform-panels/

Hi Joel, Thank you for that! Can we please get
  • The feature image and title updated to "QuietFormTM Panels" in the wall navigation page
  • Have Quietform tiles and panels removed from related products
  • Have the title under the + navigation updated to "QuietFormTM Panels"
I have attached images of the items to be updated. Thanks! Warm regards, Katie Kenna Marketing Coordinator - EMEA T: +44 (0) 203 488 6322 Level 1, 1 Old Street, London, EC1V 9HL, UK acoufelt.com

Hi Katie,

Confirming we have updated the UK site. We have now publish /quietform-panels/. And redirect /quietform-tiles-and-panels/ to /quietform-panels/
https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/quietform-tiles-and-panels/

Hi Joel, Thank you so much for your quick actions on those points! Can I also request to have:
  • QuietForm Panels page pushed live (https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/quietform-panels/)
  • The existing QuietForm page retired (https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/quietform-tiles-and-panels/) and relinked to the new webpage above
Thank you! Warm regards, Katie Kenna Marketing Coordinator - EMEA T: +44 (0) 203 488 6322 Level 1, 1 Old Street, London, EC1V 9HL, UK acoufelt.com

Hi Katie,

Confirming we have updated the site.

  • Done updating the amethyst image on all product pages
  • Done updating the colour swatch on https://acoufelt.co.uk/filasorb/
  • Done adding HPDC Logo https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/full-color-acoustic-wall-panels/
  • Removed fracture tiles on the site, navigation, resource page and redirect to Fracture panels
  • Footer has been updated

done
  1. done updating the amethyst image on all product pages
  2. done updating the colour swatch on https://acoufelt.co.uk/filasorb/
  3. remove fracture tiles on the site, navigation, and resource page
  4. footer - there is no gradient strip already

pending
  1. Add Health Product Declaration Coalition logo
  2. Relink existing Fracture tiles link to fracture panels
    https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/fracture-acoustic-wall-panels/

20mins @rica 

@joel can you check the pending items? thanks

Tasks:
  1. FilaSorb Colour Swatch
    - Amethyst image has glitched, needs updating (Image attached)
    All product pages
  2. FilaSorb Page
    - Colour swatch does not have full range of colours. Needs to be updated.
    https://acoufelt.co.uk/filasorb/
  3. Full colour wall panels

    https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/full-color-acoustic-wall-panels/

    - Retire from website
    https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/fracture-acoustic-wall-tiles/
    - Remove from navigation
    - Remove from resources page
    https://acoufelt.co.uk/resources/
    - Relink existing Fracture tiles link to fracture panels
    https://acoufelt.co.uk/solution/fracture-acoustic-wall-panels/
  5. Footer
    - Remove Gradient strip from footer(Image attached). Will be the same as the AUS website.

Hi Heath,


Lucy and Keenan have passed on your contact as we are looking to make some tweaks to the Acoufelt UK website to tidy it up.


Please let me know if you require any further info on the requests below:


FilaSorb Colour Swatch
Amethyst image has glitched, needs updating (Image attached)
 All product pages
FilaSorb Page
 Colour swatch does not have full range of colours. Needs to be updated.
https://acoufelt.co.uk/filasorb/

Add Health Product Declaration Coalition logo (Logo attached)

Fracture Tiles

Remove from navigation
Remove from resources page
